isStudent

public boolean isStudent(java.lang.Long profileId)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         java.sql.SQLException
Determine whether a coder is a student.
Parameters:
profileId - the profile_id of the coder
Returns:
true if the coder is a student (coder_type_id == 1) or false if not
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - if a database error occurs
java.rmi.RemoteException - if a system error occurs
